data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI è wooɠaaʋote è ɠidaaʋili foloi!
É ɗa-ɓɔbai leʋe è ma, é zeɠe seizu ɲadegai,
É è yiima vai ɠɛ è ʋɛ,
Gá wooɠula ga koozunɛɛi ɗa-zobo sɔlɔɔ fai zu,
Gè kwɛɛ niina, ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zee ɠa ná-masagi ʋa, nii é gulɔ ɲadegai ziɛni ma,
Tanigaani zee ɠa ta-ɠɔɔɠɔ wotoloiti ma,
Tiya mu ta ɓilisu ti loo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, zobogi ve gá-masagi ʋɛ!
